languageKey.label: WEB > PAGE MODULE
If you wish to edit the content of a page, please click the page title in the page tree to the left.
What is the TemplaVoilà page module?
Select a template for your new page:
Create page with default layout
Create an empty page based on this template:
Create a page with default content based on this template:
New content element
This is a reference to an element on page %2$d.
This element has been used %s times on this page! ID:%s

This container element has localization without inheritance enabled (langChildren = 0). This is most likely a misconfiguration since the localization features of TemplaVoilà does not support localized container fields in the native interface! Please inform the system administrator!

This container element has localization enabled but with inheritance (langChildren = 1). This situation might produce confusing displays in TemplaVoilà and you are encouraged to disable localization of this container element completely by setting langDisable = 1. Please inform the system administrator!
L10N mode: Separate!
L10N mode: Inheritance
This page acts as a mount point and its content is being replaced by another page ("%s"). Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to source page of this mount point
This page has been configured in a way that it doesn't have any content itself but instead the content of another page ("%s") is shown. Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to page containing the content elements
This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content the page "%s". Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content from the first sub page. Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content of a random sub page. Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to shortcut destination
This page refers to an external website, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page refers to an external FTP location, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page refers to an email address, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to external URL (%s)
The current page is of the type "Sysfolder". Sysfolders usually don't contain content elements but are used for collecting other types of records in a single folder.

The content of a Sysfolder is usually managed by the "List" module but you currently don't have access to that module. If you need to access the data in the Sysfolder anyway, please ask your system administrator to grant you access to the List module.

Your settings indicate that you're either don't have the general right to edit page content, or you're not allowed to modify required tables or you're not allowed to edit the content fields. We suggest you recheck the settings or get in touch with your technical support.
